name: Game Over (itch) (Rhythm Patel)
description:
You are an astronaut chosen to to find habitable exoplanets. But, you have died. Can you change your past to live?

Game Over is a narrative space game where you will face numerous dilemmas in which each decision will  have a different outcome.

Group Number: GH-49

Abhishek Pratap Singh
Rhythm Patel
Rahul Singh
Pabitra Bansal
Abhinava Phukan

(This game works best on 9:16 displays with Android 7)
